# this one is partially covered. We explode every comprehension having as value a comprehension,
# but do not explode the inner comprehension (yet). This requires big changes.
# As it's not really frequent, and not always the most readable solution let's use #fmt: off/on
x = [
    [
        i
        for i in range(8)
        if i < 4
    ]
    for j in range(10)
]

x = [
    [
        get_food(self)
        for i in range(4)
        if i < 4
    ]
    for j in range(10)
]
